english.segment1: Here I am. Drowning in a sea of my own choices. Holding to a hope by a thread. Yeah. I'm looking round. I'm calling out, fear pulls me down. When the waters rush over my head
english.segment2: You are my lifeline. You are my rescue. Strength in my weakness. Light in my darkness. You are my safety. Lifter of my head. The breath that I need when. I can't seem to breath in
english.segment3: You are my lifeline. You are my lifeline
english.segment4: How many times. How many turns will it take till I learn. You reach for me in my need. And when I cry I will faithfully find you. When life comes crashing on me
english.segment5: You are my lifeline. You are my rescue. Strength in my weakness. Light in my darkness. You are my safety. Lifter of my head. The breath that I need when. I can't seem to breath in
english.segment6: You are my lifeline. You are my lifeline
english.segment7: Your there in my brokenness. And my distress. My rock when I'm stronger when I'm powerless. You hold me and rush when tides and waters rise
english.segment9: You are my lifeline. You are my rescue. Strength in my weakness. Light in my darkness. You are my safety. Lifter of my head. The breath that I need when. I can't seem to breath in
english.segment10: You are my lifeline. You are my rescue. Strength in my weakness. Light in my darkness. You are my safety. Lifter of my head. The breath that I need when. I can't seem to breath in
english.segment11: You are my lifeline. You are my lifeline. You are my lifeline. You are my lifeline!
